1274160.name: The Enclosure
1274160.description:
Zombie arcade game! Fight endlessly against a horde! Rack up points and play to pass your high score!

The Enclosure is in Early Access!


Early Access means that the game is going to be updated a lot before it's final version.

You can expect The Enclosure to run the same as it did in Early Access, with added features, a multiplayer online, and updated artwork.

Game Caboose plans to add more game-modes before the end of the year.


The Enclosure is currently limited to single-player.
Online multiplayer will be one of the first updates included.


Planned: Traditional Survival - Scavenge through the The Enclosure's forest environment for natural sources of food and water, defending yourself with crafted items and shelter.

Planned: Competitive Elimination - Set off into a randomly generated arena to compete for weapons and food, choosing between hunting or hiding. Last player standing wins.

Planned: Online Endless Waves - Revisit The Enclosure's initial game-mode with friends or solo and defend against waves of zombies, collecting loot and unlocking new areas.

Planned: Dedicated Servers - We're hopeful of adding servers for players to connect in The Enclosure in the safest way. These servers would vary in game-mode and allow every player to experience multiplayer. Players will have the ability to host their own servers as well.
1274160.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
